description.displayText: McKenna is wonderful with children! My 3 girls love it when she babysits. She interacts with them and plays (not all sitters do this) and she's very respectful and courteous as well. Highly recommend!
description.originalText: McKenna is wonderful with children! My 3 girls love it when she babysits. She interacts with them and plays (not all sitters do this) and she's very respectful and courteous as well. Highly recommend!

description.displayText: Mckenna is the best of the best! Professional, reliable, high-energy, and focused on education. We used Mckenna as our full-time summer nanny for two summers in a row for our kids aged 8mo, 2 and 5 years old. She worked with our oldest to help him improve his reading skills and he went on to achieve "most improved reading" awards from his school. She also helped the kids form their first summer business - a neighborhood lemonade stand. I couldn't recommend her enough - we as parents & our kids absolutely loved her! (And an added bonus, she's got a Broadway voice and can sing just about any Disney song at nap time).
